description: A generic MRE box, you shouldn't see this.
A generic small MRE box, you shouldn't see this
A generic MRE entree, you shouldn't see this.
An MRE accessory pack containing a variety of utensils and drinks.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.
A sealed plastic bag containing an array of desserts.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a chili & beans entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a BBQ beef entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes delicious.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a chicken & noodles entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes bland and gross, even after all the flavoring added.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a spaghetti entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a chicken chunk entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good, if not a bit bland.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a beef taco entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good, but the flavors are a bit off.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a beef brisket entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes delicious.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a meatball entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a beef stew entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes delicious.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a chili & macaroni entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes fantastic, could be one of the best MRE menus you can get your hands on.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a vegetarian taco entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes decent, not good but not offensive either.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a macaroni marinara entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes delicious.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a cheese tortellini entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a mushroom fettuccine entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes horrible, a few steps above the infamous vomelette.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a Mexican chicken stew entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a chicken burrito bowl entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes delicious.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a maple sausage entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a ravioli entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes decent, but the flavor is just not there.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a pepper jack beef entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes decent and just a step above bland.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a hash browns & bacon entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a lemon pepper tuna entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes decent, the sweet flavor is just too strong.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with an asian beef & vegetables entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes good and exotic.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a chicken pesto entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes decent, just enough to eat.

A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a southwest beef & beans entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  This one tastes fantastic, could be one of the best MRE menus you can get your hands on.

A vintage MRE, still perfectly preserved and edible.  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  You have the potential to become the first person on Earth to be capable of enjoying this, with enough training.

A vintage MRE, still perfectly preserved and edible.  Or is it?  The contents are individually packed and will remain sealed after you open this box.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.  If you dare.

name: chili & beans entree
description: The chili & beans entree from an MRE.  Sterilized using radiation, so it's safe to eat.  It's wrapped in an atmospherically-sealed package.  This one tastes good.
The BBQ beef entree from an MRE.  Sterilized using radiation, so it's safe to eat.  It's wrapped in an atmospherically-sealed package.  This one tastes delicious.

name: frankfurters & beans entree
description: The dreaded four fingers of death.  It seems to be several decades old.  Sterilized using radiation, so it's safe to eat.  It's wrapped in an atmospherically-sealed package.  You have the potential to become the first person on Earth to be capable of enjoying this, with enough training.

name: cheese omelette entree
description: The unholy vomelette.  It seems to be several decades old.  Sterilized using radiation, so you might be mistaken that it is safe to eat.  It's wrapped in an atmospherically-sealed package.  Keep this one for the dogs that you happen to really, really hate.
